item.title: What The Quantile Really Is?
item.description: Intro So what is a quantile? It's a statistic so it gives us aggregated information about some data sample. For example let's say we have data sample representing salary of employees of some company. Quantile can gives us answer on question "How much should I be paid to earn more then 90% of employees?". Let's say sample is \[ S = \lbrace 140, 80, 70, 200, 100 \rbrace \] How would you answer the question for this sample?
